title: Looking for a Budget Smartphone
subtitle: Need suggestions under $300
description: I'm searching for a reliable smartphone with decent camera quality and battery life within a $300 budget.

title: Recommendation: Moto G Power
subtitle: Affordable and long-lasting
description: The Moto G Power offers excellent battery life and decent performance, making it a great option under $300.

title: User Feedback on Moto G Power
subtitle: Personal experience
description: I've been using the Moto G Power for several months, and its battery performance is impressive for the price point.
